Room.Name: The Cavern Crypts
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the giant crypt of the great mages of Keslar.
Room.LongDescription: The caverns are quite dark and damp. For centuries, no one has dared to enter this realm of good which has been guarded by evil. The evil mages of Keslar cannot enter the crypt because of the overwhelming spirit of the ancient mages.
